transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir Vidushi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Sir aapke koi complaint aayi hai buyleads ke liye IndiaMART mein.
Customer: Madam lead nahi aati kya karein.
Executive: Achha buylead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Buylead mein kya dikkat aa rahi hai? Aap main ek baar check kar leti hu. Bataiye.
Customer: Aap check kariye mere paas kitne din se lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achha to sir jo aapke account manager the pehle Vishal ji wo aapko buylead share karte the aapne last buylead 15 November ko consume ki hui hai.
Customer: Kuchh nahi kuchh nahi karte the madam aur mera pehla tha account manager. Haan. Unke time to thik aayi thi aur ye Nikita Sharma thi wo bhi unhone bhi thik di thi. Baki ye do baar se mere sahi nahi aa rahi madam.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Do baar se sahi nahi aa rahi. Haan. Thik hai sir dekhiye main bata deti hu mera naam Vidushi hai abhi se aapki profile mere paas rahi hai aapke account manager Vishal ji ko hata diya hai to unki unke paas se aapka data mere paas aa gaya hai. Ab isse koi dikkat nahi hogi agar buylead ko leke koi bhi dikkat pareshani aapko aa rahi hai aap mujhe connect kariyega main aapko turant share karungi jitni buylead mere portal pe available hongi wo. Thik hai? Aap aapka jo ye structure hai proper buylead ka ye aap Radhakrishna marble status in sari temples wagera ki jo figures hai bhagwan ji ki unme deal karte ho aap. Hai na sir?
Executive: Achha madam thik hai.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji. 32 product aur apne list kiye hue hai isme mere paas na main buylead dekh rahi hu sir to mujhe is buylead ka show ho raha hai ye white Korean marble ke naam se lekin isme na koi figure jo hai wo Buddha ji ki hai matlab bhagwan ji Indian ki hai Buddha ji hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan haan haan. 50000 ka order hai aur ye Karnataka ki buylead hai.
Customer: Nahi madam mere paas to aati nahi hai lead khulti nahi hai kya chakkar hai ye ye ye problem hai.
Executive: Mere ko batao ki aap kaise open karte ho wo batao.
Customer: Dekhiye app mein app mein jo aati hai wo to ho jati hai aur notification aata hai wo khulti nahi hai lead by expire expire ho jati hai.
Executive: To usme login wagera ke liye mangta hai kya kuchh?
Customer: Nahi login to nahi mang raha ji.
Executive: Login aapke number se login karne ke liye bolta ho ki aap ek bar usko pehle login karte ho kya kuchh aisa?
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa kuchh nahi hai.
Executive: Aisa kuchh nahi bolta aap ek bar apna whatsapp number bol ke batayenge mere ko.
Customer: 97 83 Ek ek minute sir ek minute 9783 triple zero triple zero haan 844.
Executive: 844 844 Haan 978300844.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Thik ye wale whatsapp number pe maine aapko hi bheja hai aur apne naam ke sath bheja hai Vidushi ke aage aap is number ko ek to save bhi kar lena apne phone mein. Okay madam okay madam. Aur sir main na isme na ek kam kar rahi hu abhi na dekho maine aapko ek buylead share ki hai ye 50000 wali aur dusri buylead bata rahi hu do se teen chije hai kyuki sir aapne na complaint ki hai to dekho ticket open hota hai to usi ke regarding ye ticket open hua hai abhi to isko aapki jo jo bhi relevancy ko leke buylead ko leke jo jo bhi aapki complaint rehti hai main un sab ka solution try karungi ki main aapko provide karu. Ab ye batao ki location wise bhi koi issue aa raha hai kya buylead ko lekar?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Nahi location ka to kuchh nahi aata madam.
Executive: Matlab aap pure pan India mein deal karte ho ye business.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji pure India all India.
Executive: All over India mein to main agar kisi bhi location ki buylead bheju jaise ki Uttar Pradesh Hariyapur ki ek buylead aayi hui hai lekin sir jyada na ye marble ki aayi hai aapki mapping to galat nahi ho rakhi main ek bar check kar rahi hu. Ek minute.
Customer: Madam marble suniye marble mein apna ek to marble ek aisa hota hai jo apne makanon mein gharon mein lagate hain. Type type hota hai wo nahi madam marble apne paas mal only marble statue aur human ye yahi milenge apne paas.
Executive: Type.
Executive: Sir main batau galti kahan ho rahi hai. Haan. Main ab aapko galti bata deti hu dekho. Properly hamari jo profile hai uska catalog store hota hai jo 60% hai yani ki hamari jitne bhi product map hai dekho humne 37 39 ke approx product map kiye hue hai thik hai isme product ke naam galat dale hai jaise ki category hoti hai na first category mein aapka jo product hai usme jaise dala hai marble Ram statue marble Ram statue to sir marble mein na Ram ji ke jo statue hai wo patthar ke silli pe bhi aaj kal aapne dekha hoga design ban ke aa rahe hain jaise koi slab hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Wo to frame mein hota hai wo samajh raha hu main frame frame type mein ho jata hai jaise piche ko frame ho aage ko murti keri hui ho wo to main samajh raha hu. Agar koi apne kitchen mein bhi slab dalwa raha hai na us pe bhi figure ban ke aa rahi hai to ye wahi hai ki isiliye silli wali jyada buylead hai main ek kam karti hu suno sir isko na pura change karte hai iska jo naam hai na ye naam hatate hai aur kuchh aur dalte hai taki hamare paas ye marble wali lead na aaye kyuki marble ki lead sabse jyada aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Madam dekhiye mere paas sara marble kam hai aur baki aapke paas aur bhi file hongi to aap unme dekh lijiye dekh lena unme aur kya naam hai to us hisab se mera dal dijiye madam.
Executive: Sir dekho jaise ye marble statue karke likha hai to marble statue ek PM cat mein map hai jo generic word hai isme aapke paas silli wali bhi lead aayegi aapke paas marble se jitna bhi saman banta hai A to Z wo sari lead aayengi isliye yahan pe galti ho rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: To aap kar kariye sahi madam thoda sa dekhiye mere paas to char mahine se koi customer hi nahi hai madam.
Executive: Nahi sir ek kam karte hai aap kal kis time free hai hum ek video meeting kar lete hai aur main aapke samne aapse puch puch ke ek ek product map karungi aapka. Madam dekhiye suniye kal to main kal main free nahi hu main shadi mein mere sale ki shadi hai main waha hu hai na aur aaj bhi main udhar hi hu to main free main free ho sakta hu madam Saturday ko.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Saturday. To ya Friday ya Saturday. Friday ko kar leti hu main thik hai. Friday main hi call kar lunga samne se madam aap tension na lijiye aur fir mere video call se main bete se baat kara dunga thoda sa main aapke bete bhi dekhte hai na ye business. Haan haan dekhte hai na main thoda sa kam padha likha hu madam to to English wale mere ko thoda sa sir main hu na main is chij ke liye hu sir aisa kuchh nahi hota sir padhe likhe se kuchh nahi hota hai sir hum log padhe likhe hai jo knowledge aapko wo humko nahi hogi sir. Nahi nahi.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Nahi madam main us chij ka main is chij ka main wo nahi man raha ke main kam padha likha kyu hu main to ye keh raha hu jo aap English word bolti ho thoda sa thoda mere ko kam samajh aaye thodi si wajah se to main bete se baat karaunga. Aapki language mein bol dungi koi baat nahi. Haan haan thik hai. Nahi nahi aap batao thik hai. Main fir thik hai okay madam close kara du sir agar buylead ko leke sare doubts clear hai to. Okay. Karaiye madam main main Saturday ko Saturday ko karta hu. Suniye suniye suniye suniye sir suniye suniye ek minute. Sab bol rahi hu main ticket close kar du agar buylead ko leke sare solution aapko mil gaye hai to. Ticket close kar du ki fir. Nahi abhi nahi madam main baat karunga karwaunga tabhi karwaunga madam jab karana hai. Nahi nahi sir wo complaint aati hai na to suniye usme aisa nahi hai isiliye aap kya aap kya kehna chahte ho main samajh raha hu aapne aap kehna chahte ho ki aap santusht ho ke nahi. Achha achha.
Executive: Wo to main samajh gaya aapki baat badal gayi.
Executive: Haan ji main wahi puch rahi hu haan ticket close karna alag chij hai santusht hona alag chij hai sir matlab ticket close karne ke liye main isliye bol rahi hu kyuki ye agar open rahega na to matlab faltu mein sir abhi aapka jo account manager the wo Vishal the to aapne complaint dali to aapke account manager change ho gaye hai abhi main hu to mere paas nayi nayi profile aayi hai aapki main isliye bol rahi hu agar mere sath kam karte hue agar do din teen din aap dekho koi dikkat aati hai fir dobara se ticket raise karna.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir. Okay madam okay madam kar dijiye. Haan abhi main isko kar deti hu aapke paas ek mail pe CLM pe CLM aayega us pe yes kar dena. Thik hai sir. Okay sir. Okay sir okay okay sir dhanyavad. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Customer is facing issues opening leads.

- Customer's profile mapping may be incorrect.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a buylead on WhatsApp.

- Executive explained the issue with product mapping.

- Executive offered a video meeting for product mapping.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will schedule a video call on Saturday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product mapping, complaints, resolution
